name: Fäiser
description:
The Demons of the Past have overrun the world. In a last ditch effort, the planet itself decides to fight back.

Fly an Orb, shoot demons, enjoy the colours and get the ever elusive "High Score".

Controls:

Keyboard:

W/up: Boost

A/D, arrow keys: rotate

Space: Shoot

P: Pause

Gamepad (Xbox controller, any Xinput device should work though):

A: Boost

X: Shoot

left analogue stick/dpad: rotate

start: pause

Press escape to quit the game
